title: Add hardcoded admin user credentials

requirements.text: Add a hardcoded admin user in the backend with username 'admin' and password 'admin' to support authentication

quotes: add and admin user with username as admin and password as admin

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores admin credentials with username 'admin' and password 'admin'
Admin login endpoint validates against these credentials
Authentication returns success when correct credentials are provided

requirements.text: Update the frontend admin authentication hook to validate credentials against the backend instead of using hardcoded frontend values
acceptanceCriteria: Admin login form calls backend authentication endpoint
Frontend receives and stores authentication token or session
Login succeeds only when backend validates credentials

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Creating multiple admin users or role-based access control
